Dialogue.Page: So, update, I've landed on the equator.
I'm currently running a test on atmospheric composition.
From the results thus far, the composition is similar to that of Timber Hearth.
The only difference is that it's more salty, but still breathable.
-and I guess the only logical next step is to go to another planet. That spongy one looks interesting.
It's poles are oddly smooth in comparison to the area around the equator.
That being said, I might as well have a look at them.
Oh! Also! Follow the distress beacon frequency, even though I won't be in any distress. Hopefully.
I'll just set this thing right here...
